title: help with new emotes
body: Hello!, i bought some of the new emotes but T doesnt work to bring them up during a game, and i cant find it anywhere on the options to even change the hot key, are they still disable or what? {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: Those emotes don't work in practice games right now (or custom games either I believe). You'll be able to use T to pull up those emotes when you're in a normal game.
